name: PITCH-HIT: BASEBALL
description: A fun and challenging VR Baseball Experience! Catch your own hits! Smash stuff with baseballs! Choose different batting options and so much more!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 1070 Storage: 1 GB available space
